EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email is sent to Review Owner to Review Pre-Application
EmailTemplate.name: GG Review Pre-Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Review the Pre-Application {!ApplicationReview__c.PreApplicationId__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Pre-Application {!ApplicationReview__c.PreApplication__c} for the Funding Opportunity# {!ApplicationReview__c.FundingOpportunityId__c} is ready for your review.
Hello {!ApplicationReview__c.OwnerId},
The Pre-Application {!ApplicationReview__c.PreApplication__c} has been assigned to you for your review. Please login to EGMS System to complete the review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
